the outside.translation[0].definitions[0: the part or surface of something that is furthest from the centre
The outside of the house was painted white.
the outside.translation[0].definitions[1: the area around something such as a building, vehicle etc
From the outside, it looked like any other big warehouse.
the outside.translation[0].definitions[2: someone who is on or from the outside is not involved in an activity or does not belong to a particular group, organization etc
Influences from the outside can undermine the values you want to teach your children.
To anyone on the outside, our marriage seemed perfect.
